alert.note: Alert for Greater Lake Tahoe Area (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued November 05 at 2:27AM PST until November 06 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST MONDAY FOR LAKE TAHOE... * CHANGES...Starting advisory now and extending through Monday afternoon. * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. Gusts could reach 45 mph at times early this morning and late tonight into early Monday morning. Waves 2 to 4 feet. Highest waves from mid lake to the north and east shores. * WHERE...Greater Lake Tahoe Area. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions improve.
info.instruction: Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.
